item.title: Intro to GLM: Calculating Pure Premium with SAS
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: Using a dataset with only four variables as an example to fit a GLM and calculate pure car insurance premiums.

item.title: Intro to GLM: Modeling in R and SAS
item.author: wilajeni
item.description: A comparison of the proc genmod in SAS and the glm() function in R for building GLM models.
